ivory.smrf.retrieval
Class XMLQueryFileReader

java.lang.Object
  ivory.smrf.retrieval.QueryFileReaderBase
      ivory.smrf.retrieval.XMLQueryFileReader

public class XMLQueryFileReader
extends QueryFileReaderBase

A class to read query files from an XML file and iterate over query_id and query_text values. A tokenizer preprocesses query text and the array of tokens are returned.

Author:
ferhanture
